classroom

Class FrontWallWithScreenAndLights

  • java.lang.Object
    • classroom.FrontWall
      • classroom.FrontWallWithScreen
        • classroom.FrontWallWithScreenAndLights
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    visual.statik.SimpleContent

    public class FrontWallWithScreenAndLights
extends FrontWallWithScreen
    This class is used to display a simulated classroom with on/off light functionality and a projection screen that can be partially lowered.
    Author:
    Ben Kirtley This work complies with the James Madison University honor code
